author: Jen
title: Mum sparks national search for hero estate agent her kids fell in love with
text:
Dan the man. (Picture: Facebook/ The Motherload) A long-suffering estate agent found unexpected fame after his visit to value a flat ended up with him being asked ‘please can you wipe my bum’. 
Dan Stevenson showed up to do a routine call in London, and ended up the focus of a national manhunt to find the ‘poor’ man in a suit who only wanted to assess proximity to local amenities.
Pensioner jailed for killing biker after ignoring DVLA note to renew his licence ‘This is Dan. He just valued our flat,’ Lorna Hayward captioned a Facebook photo of him along with her two daughters Elsie and Marnie.
‘I had warned him, that arriving in my only available slot of the day at 5pm was risky. Nevertheless he rocked up.
‘In the last hour Dan (who is a complete stranger) has had both my daughters request cuddles, can he hold their hands, if he would watch Peppa with them, does he like cheese, if he was staying the night and the finale – Elsie walking out of the toilet announcing she had just done “her biggest poo yet – it was a bit spikey though, so please can you wipe my bum”.
He’s single, FYI (Picture: Facebook/ Dan Stevenson) 
‘Poor Dan. Poor poor Dan. Gonna just pour meself a pint of wine.’
Her post was shared thousands of the times after appearing on the Motherload , sparking the hashtag #FindDan.
Man collapsed and died during 5k Park Run The search was successful, with Purple Bricks estate agents coming forward to say it was their employee Dan Stevenson who had visited the flat in Wandsworth.
Describing the post as ‘amazing and hilarious’, they added: ‘Good on you Dan!’
Lorna with Elsie and Marnie (Picture: Facebook/Lorna Hayward)  
Lorna told Motherload she phoned Dan to talk about what happened, telling him ‘You managed to cope pretty well with my girls infatuation with you’.
She said: ‘Dan seemed rather unfazed and told me that he had an email from the CEO of Purple Bricks last night saying how he had seen a post and photo about Dan on a mum site.
‘Dan seemed pretty chuffed at that. I also felt it was only right, and fair to the dedicated fans of Dan, to ask if he was single. The answer is YES. Soz Dan, I think you’re about to get a LOT of attention.’
